readme:
# ComfyUI Flux Template

This template provides a production-ready ComfyUI environment with:

- **ComfyUI**: Latest version with Flux model support
- **FileBrowser**: Web-based file manager (port 8080)
- **CivitAI Integration**: Automatic model downloads
- **GPU Support**: Optimized for RTX 4090/5090, A100, H100

## Ports
- **7860**: ComfyUI Web Interface
- **8080**: FileBrowser (if enabled)
- **3000**: Alternative UI port

## Environment Variables
- `USE_VOLUME`: Use persistent volume (recommended: true)
- `FILEBROWSER`: Enable file browser (true/false)
- `FILEBROWSER_PASSWORD`: FileBrowser password
- `CIVITAI_TOKEN`: Your CivitAI API token
- `CHECKPOINT_IDS_TO_DOWNLOAD`: Model IDs to download
- `LORA_IDS_TO_DOWNLOAD`: LoRA IDs to download
- `VAE_IDS_TO_DOWNLOAD`: VAE IDs to download

## Usage
1. Set your CivitAI token and model IDs
2. Start the pod
3. Access ComfyUI at `https://[pod-id]-7860.proxy.runpod.net`
4. Access FileBrowser at `https://[pod-id]-8080.proxy.runpod.net`

## Model Downloads
Models are automatically downloaded from CivitAI on startup if token and IDs are provided.

## Persistent Storage
When `USE_VOLUME=true`, all models and data persist between pod restarts.
